## Cox-Beta

Let $\mathbf{x} = (x_1, \ldots, x_m)$ and $\mathbf{y} = (y_1, \ldots, y_m)$ be the features vectors of two patients.  

$$d(\mathbf{x}, \mathbf{y}) = \sum_{i=1,..,p} |\alpha(x_i, y_i)\cdot d(x_i, y_i)|$$
